title.rendered: “Decisive Joint IDF-ISA Operation: Elimination of Key Gaza Terror Commander and Associates”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In a joint operation by the IDF and the ISA, one of the commanders of the Rafah Brigades in the Gaza terror organization was eliminated; he was one of the leaders of the terror organization’s attack on Israeli territory during the events of October 7th.

Led by the Gaza Division, the Israeli Air Force, and the ISA, fighter jets earlier today (Saturday) in the southern Gaza Strip, eliminated the terrorist Imad Zaarub, a senior figure in Gaza’s terror organization who had instructed and directed several attacks, and oversaw various infiltration attempts into the country in recent years.

Zaarub was in charge of the terror attack by the Nachba terrorists of the Gaza organization on a settlement and a Sofa outpost on October 7th, and from his hiding place, he led the Gaza organization’s preparations for combat in the south of the Strip in recent days.

Along with Zaarub, two other terrorists from the Gaza terror organization who were with him in the hiding apartment were eliminated.

Attached is the ID card of Imad Zaarub: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC0405202448759385

Attached is a documentation of his elimination: https://bit.ly/3y5M55i
